Property.name: EnableSpeedFixes
Property.HelpText: Some objects and animations in SADX weren't adjusted for 60 FPS, these fixes correct them. Disable for a more vanilla-like SADX experience.

Property.name: EnableDreamcastWaterRipple
Property.HelpText: Enable the ingame water ripple model from the Dreamcast version.

Property.name: RestoreHumpAnimations
Property.HelpText: Restore item hold animations (like in SA1 JP) and fix various animation errors.

Property.name: CutsceneSkipConfig
Property.HelpText: Improves handling of skippable cutscenes. Cutscenes can be skipped with a single button press. Fade to black makes skipping cutscenes smoother.

Property.name: EnableCutsceneFix
Property.HelpText: Restore camera transitions that are supposed to happen after cutscenes.

Property.name: ImpressFont
Property.HelpText: Enable the fonts from DC/GC versions of the game. Use Impress for English and Comic Sans (experimental) for other European languages.

Property.name: DisableFontSmoothing
Property.HelpText: SADXPC adds a white outline that makes the font thicker. This option disables that to make the text sharper, like in SA1.

Property.name: DisableFontFiltering
Property.HelpText: Enable this option to make subtitles sharp and pixelated, like in SA1. Disable for a filtered (blurrier/smoother) look.

Property.name: ColorizeFont
Property.HelpText: Imitate the DC SA1 subtitle font color. Disabling this will make the subtitle font white, like in vanilla SADX.

Property.name: EnableDreamcastBranding
Property.HelpText: Restore menu textures, options, button prompts, tutorials etc. from the Dreamcast version.

Property.name: EnableWindowTitle
Property.HelpText: Change the game's window title to Sonic Adventure instead of SonicAdventureDXPC. Disable this for compatibility with Fusion's Chao Editor.

Property.name: FPSLock
Property.HelpText: Locks FPS to 30 everywhere outside menus and Twinkle Circuit.

Property.name: SuppressWarnings
Property.HelpText: Disable warnings related to mod compatibility.

Property.name: RestoreYButton
Property.HelpText: Use the Y button for actions like on DC (only works outside the Chao Gardens).

Property.name: BigBeltFix
Property.HelpText: Partial fix for a transparency issue with Big's belt.

Property.name: EnableDXOceanEffects
Property.HelpText: Combine SA1 ocean with SADX ocean effects (bobbing, UV shift).

Property.name: RevertEmeraldCoastDrawDistance
Property.HelpText: Revert skybox scale in Emerald Coast. The ocean will no longer be aligned with the horizon, but fog and draw distance will be the same as in SADX.

Property.name: Use1999SetFiles
Property.HelpText: Optimized layouts fix duplicate objects, errors with object placement, various object placement glitches etc. The other two options use unaltered layouts from the Dreamcast game. Warning: Unaltered layouts are incompatible with Mission Mode!

Property.name: EnableLSDFix
Property.HelpText: Make Sonic travel farther (like on the Dreamcast) when using the Light Speed Dash. This is required for compatibility with original Dreamcast SET files.

Property.name: EnableWhiteDiffuse
Property.HelpText: White diffuse is a side effect (or a bug) of the Dreamcast version's lighting system that makes some things appear brighter. Enable to recreate a more faithful DC look with Lantern Engine.

Property.name: FixHeldObjects
Property.HelpText: Improve collision and fix various issues with throwable objects (experimental).

Property.name: EnableCasinopolisCowgirl
Property.HelpText: Replace the billboard on the second floor of Casinopolis with the cowgirl billboard from the Japanese version of SA1.

Property.name: JapaneseLostWorldSpikes
Property.HelpText: Make spikes in Lost World desynchronized like in the Japanese version of the game.

Property.name: EnableHedgehogHammer
Property.HelpText: Fix textures in the Trial version of Hedgehog Hammer and improve transparency handling.

Property.name: EnableTwinkleCircuit
Property.HelpText: Restore the original version of the first Twinkle Circuit track, fix transparency issues in Twinkle Park and Twinkle Circuit shared objects.

Property.name: EnableSkyChaseEnemyModels
Property.HelpText: Restore textures for Sky Chase enemies and the model and textures for the Egg Carrier.

Property.name: EnableSandHill
Property.HelpText: Replace the Sand Hill level and textures.

Property.name: RestoreDemos
Property.HelpText: Restore gameplay demos played after waiting on the title screen (experimental).

Property.name: RemoveCream
Property.HelpText: Disable Cream cameos in Station Square.

Property.name: SA1LogoMode
Property.HelpText: Select the title screen layout.

Property.name: HUDTweak
Property.HelpText: Adjust the life icon's position to be more like SA1.

Property.name: RemoveQuitPrompt
Property.HelpText: Disable confirmation prompt when exiting the level from the pause menu.

Property.name: RemoveSetUpPad
Property.HelpText: Remove 'Set up pad' from the list of options in the pause menu.

Property.name: RemoveMap
Property.HelpText: Remove 'Map' from the list of options in the pause menu.

Property.name: RemoveCamera
Property.HelpText: Remove camera from the list of options in the pause menu.

Property.name: RemoveGameGearGames
Property.HelpText: Remove 'Mini Game Collection' from the list of options in the main menu.

Property.name: RemoveMissionMode
Property.HelpText: Replace Mission Mode with the Internet demo from SA1 Limited Edition.

Property.name: RemoveMarketRingCount
Property.HelpText: Don't display Black Market ring count after beating a stage.

Property.name: RemoveUnlockMessage
Property.HelpText: Don't display 'unlocked' messages for Game Gear games and Metal Sonic.

Property.name: DrawNowSaving
Property.HelpText: Display the 'Now saving' text when the game is being saved.

Property.name: DisableAllVideoStuff
Property.HelpText: Disable all video-related functionality, including the FMV fadeout feature. If this setting is enabled, all other settings in this section will be ignored.

Property.name: EnableSA1Intro
Property.HelpText: Use the Dreamcast Sonic Adventure intro recreated from multiple sources in higher quality.

Property.name: SonicTeamLogoConfig
Property.HelpText: Show the Sonic Team logo before the intro movie: animated (SA1), static (SADX), or disable entirely.

Property.name: ColorizeVideos
Property.HelpText: Dreamcast SA1 uses vertex lighting to adjust video colors. Enabling this makes the FMVs slightly darker, but closer to what they look like on a real Dreamcast.

Property.name: DisableChao
Property.HelpText: Disable all Chao code changes, including texture replacements and Chao Race restoration.

Property.name: EnableChaoRaceLobby
Property.HelpText: Restore the interactive Chao Race lobby from the Dreamcast version.

Property.name: DisableChaoButtonPrompts
Property.HelpText: Hide SADX button instructions in the Chao Gardens.

Property.name: ReplaceTrees
Property.HelpText: Replace the palm trees with their Dreamcast counterparts.

Property.name: ReplaceFruits
Property.HelpText: Replace Normal Fruit with SA1 Coconut, Hero Fruit with Star Fruit, Dark Fruit with Hastnut, Heart Fruit with Lifenut, Chao Fruit with Chaonut.

Property.name: ReplaceEggs
Property.HelpText: Replace normal, black, silver and gold Chao egg models (including wearable eggshells) with SA1 counterparts.

Property.name: ReplaceNameMachine
Property.HelpText: Replace the Name Machine with the VMU.
